sense.def:
To replace a person or thing
pomeni, da ena oseba ali stvar prevzame mesto ali naloge druge.

seg.quote: Thomas bought a new sweater to replace the one he lost.

sense.def:
To replace something
pomeni, da namesto nečesa poškodovanega, izgubljenega ali zastarelega dobimo nekaj drugega, to pa uporabimo za enak namen.

seg.quote: The books that have been stolen will have to be replaced.
The airline is currently replacing its DC10s with Boeing 747s.

sense.def:
To replace something
pomeni tudi dati nekaj tja, kjer je bilo prej.

cit.quote: vrniti na prejšnje mesto, dati nazaj
